channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Man and child found dead in Missouri home after exchange of gunfire with officers
item.description: A man and a child were found dead inside a Missouri home and a sheriff’s deputy was injured after the man and police exchanged gunfire.

item.title: Steve Bannon’s trial in a border wall charity scheme case delayed until February
item.description: Conservative strategist Steve Bannon’s trial on state charges of conspiring to dupe donors to a border wall charity will be postponed from next month to late February.

item.title: Georgia moves forward in creating voucher program for private and home schools
item.description: A new Georgia program that will give up to $6,500 a year to some families to pay for private school tuition or home-schooling expenses will begin accepting applications in early 2025.
